title: Reversing type 2 diabetes with lifestyle change.
summary: Type 2 diabetes is now at epidemic levels in the UK and becoming increasingly costly for the NHS to treat. ...This article examines the effectiveness of a healthy, calorie-controlled diet and exercise regime in reversing type 2 diabetes....
abstract: Type 2 diabetes is now at epidemic levels in the UK and becoming increasingly costly for the NHS to treat. Risk factors include a high-carbohydrate diet and sedentary lifestyle. This article examines the effectiveness of a healthy, calorie-controlled diet and exercise regime in reversing type 2 diabetes.
